summary: This is an email from attorney Marc A. Weinstein to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), responding to a grand jury subpoena request for trust documents related to the estate of Jeffrey Epstein. The email transmits documents from prior wills and trusts of Epstein.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.context: Partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed who is responding to a grand jury subpoena on behalf of the executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, transmitting requested trust documents.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: Appears to be copied on the email regarding the grand jury subpoena response for Epstein estate documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased individual whose estate and prior wills/trusts are the subject of the grand jury subpoena and document production.

connections.description: Weinstein is acting as legal counsel for the executors of Epstein's estate, representing the estate's interests in response to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Production of Epstein Trust Documents
events.description: Attorney Marc A. Weinstein transmits documents related to prior trusts referenced in Jeffrey Epstein's wills to the U.S. Attorney's Office in response to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: Prior Production of Epstein Wills
events.description: The executors of Jeffrey Epstein's estate produced prior wills of Epstein to the authorities.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoenas Issued to Estate Executors
events.description: Grand jury subpoenas were issued to the executors of the estate of Jeffrey Epstein, compelling the production of documents.

locations: New York, NY 10004-1482 (Office of Hughes Hubbard & Reed)
keyFacts: A grand jury investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's affairs was active as of October 2019, with subpoenas issued to his estate executors.
The estate's attorneys complied with the subpoena by producing documents related to prior trusts referenced in Epstein's wills.
The document production includes Bates-stamped documents GL_000333 through GL_000405, indicating an organized evidence collection process.
The communication shows ongoing legal proceedings and evidence gathering related to Epstein's estate after his death.
